issue.title: www.kinopoisk.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: The description of Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List should warn about changing websites' appearance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.8.1.1140 release (CL-1.9.62, DNS-1.7.22) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? many websites ### What filters do you have enabled? Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List includes Dandelion Sprout's Website Stretcher, which is a very opnionated list that alters the look of many websites. Most narrow webpages are narrow because it's easier to read, not because "[many websites still think that everyone are using narrow monitors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/Dandelion%20Sprout's%20Website%20Stretcher.txt)". This list shouldn't be embedded in a annoyance filter in the first place. However, if it has to, the description should warn the user that the filter alters websites' looks and may break them. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List on, GitHub's profile page slightly broken
Screenshot 2: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List off
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: top.gg
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://top.gg/bot/432610292342587392/vote](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftop.gg%2Fbot%2F432610292342587392%2Fvote) ### Comment > Top.gg is a site where you vote for a bot daily and receive certain perks or benefits from it on discord while playing the game that that bot offers. AdGuard used to be phenomenal in blocking out those ads and allowing me to skip straight to voting, but now I have to wait for an ad that doesn't even show up to end before I can vote and move on. It is time consuming and more than a little annoying, particularly annoying that ads were implemented in the first place when all users want to do is show support for the bots they like. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/eRwpdH1.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.8.10 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | AdBlock Plus
